content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work and called my wife at 6:55 pm to let her know i was on my way.  i spotted the object while driving past chico's on hwy 190.  it had a plasma like appearance, like that of a comet's tail illuminated by the sun.  (see similar report in case #32436.)  

the orb then began to morph and suddenly elongated in a northwesterly direction.  then, it returned to its original approximate shape at it's northwesterly limit.  i would say that it streaked from one spot to another but it didn't leave a trail; it was more of a distinct projection.  

i told my dubious wife to go outside and see if she could see it.  she later told me that she walked around our house (west of downtown covington) but did not see it.  

i ended our call at 7:02 pm, made a right turn onto asbury dr, immediately turned into the shopping plaza, and pulled alongside another vehicle stopped beside voodoo bbq.  during this time i had watched the object disappear and then reappear further to the east-northeast and lower on the horizon.  the owner of the car next to me was standing in front of his vehicle also witnessing the event.  i exited my car and asked him, "what is that thing?" to which he replied, "that's a ufo!"  his two young sons were in the church parking lot ahead of us also watching the orb.  the older son captured some pictures and video on his phone.  we exchanged e-mail addresses but i have not yet received any pictures or video.  

i heard one of the boys describe the object as turning sideways.  i did not witness any maneuver that i would describe that way but perhaps that is how he perceived the elongation that i witnessed, or he might have been describing something that i did not see.  i don't know how long the object was in the sky before i saw it and i had to take my eyes off it periodically while driving.  i asked one of the boys how long they had been watching the ufo and he said it had been a couple of minutes.

the older boy showed me part of the video he recorded on his phone, so i know he has footage of the object but i didn't see the whole thing and don't know how much of the event he captured.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Comet-like orb in north sky that changed shape and direction, then disappeared and reappeared further to the east and lower on the horizon

content.detailedDescription:
On tuesday, october 4, 2011, at about 8:00 p.M., i was driving in the parking lot of woodson village shopping center at 63rd street and woodson rd. in raytown, missouri, going west toward apple market, when i observed an unidentified flying object rapidly descending at a 90% angle from the western sky behind apple market.  it appeared to move from the 90% angle into a horizontal position as if it were about to land on the roof of apple market.  at this time it appeared to be about 100 feet above the roof of apple market and about 100 feet in diameter.  

the object itself was not actually visible to me, only the lights.  there appeared to be a ring of approximately twenty regularly spaced bluish lights with a second smaller ring of what seemed like four flashing or rotating yellow-greenish lights as if they were perched some ten feet higher than the larger ring of lights.  i think there were also three or four other yellow-greenish lights spaced between the two rings of lights, but it may have been the same three or four yellow-greenish lights appearing at different perspectives as the object moved at various angles and changed direction.  i almost discerned some black or dark structural aspects that gave the impression of a large disc weight as is used with barbells with a smaller disc weight centered on top of it.

as the lights first came into my view moving down out of the sky directly toward me, i thought it must be fireworks, but it did not disintegrate and leave ash trails.  instead it got clearer.  i was really shocked and paralyzed with awe as it came toward me and did not seem as if it would stop.  then i thought it must be some kind of an aircraft about to crash, or perhaps a meteor, and you can imagine the thoughts that raced through my mind.  i was quite calm and thinking logically through all this.  i thought to grab my phone to call and say a final goodbye to family, but did not feel i would have time to make such a call.  that���s how fast it was moving and how close it came. i was not afraid, but nonetheless relieved when it leveled off and hovered over apple market instead of continuing on towards me.  

i reached for my camera, which i usually keep in my car, and turned it on, but the object suddenly turned due north of apple market and flew over the subdivision immediately north of 63rd street.  it appeared to fly just barely above the treetops and disappeared.  in a second or two it reappeared partially obscured from view by the trees.  

the entire sighting lasted about four minutes, long enough for me to get a really good look at it.  i just sat in the car in the parking lot for a few moments trying to figure out what had just happened.  the lights were so beautiful, like a colorful constellation, a carnival ride, fireworks, or christmas tree lights.  once they did not crash into me, i really hoped i could see them again.  as i mentioned before, i did not feel frightened, only exhilarated. 

the object had not made any noise as far as i could tell.  i have seen airplanes and stealth bombers and helicopters and it did not seem to be any of those, unless one were painted black or very dark and had a ring of lights attached to the bottom of it.  i thought for a moment it might have been a police helicopter searching for a suspect in the dark, but it was way too big and did not have search lights, only the lights described earlier.  plus, those tend to be very noisy, and this object was not.  i considered the possibility that it might have been some kind of projected holographic image or special effects for a sci-fi movie being filmed.  if it had been a pre-halloween prank, it was a good one!

i looked around to see if anyone else had seen the event.  there were only a few cars in the parking lot.  i only saw two people and they were outside of apple market, one was just coming out of the store apparently oblivious to what had just occurred.  the people inside the store i saw through the window seemed equally oblivious.  there was a man walking from his car toward the entrance of apple market with his head bent downward and he had been parked so close to the building that he likely would not have seen the event.  the blinds at the window of fantastic sam���s were drawn and i did not see anything unusual through the glass door.  the other stores were all closed.  only the bar was open, and i was not about to go in there and announce what i had just 8seen. 

i sat in the parking lot until 8:08 p.M., and then i began to drive in north on woodson in an attempt to get a glimpse of the object again.  i drove throughout the subdivision north of apple market but did not view the object again.  

i called only a few close family and friends.  i was really concerned that if i told anyone else they might think i had become mentally unstable or was hallucinating due to some physical illness or fatigue.  

i am convinced that what i saw was very real and not some hallucination or figment of my imagination.  i had considered that it might be some kind of spiritual phenomena, and as appealing as that thought may be, i don���t think it was. i am highly doubtful that the object was made by aliens from outer space, but i would not rule out that possibility.  my best guess is that what i saw was some secret military project of the u.S. or some other country, say, china.

i heard on the radio today that numerous independent reports of sightings of unidentified flying objects in the kansas city, lee���s summit, and raytown areas had been made.  that feels like a validation, although i don���t need one to satisfy myself.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ring of blueish lights 100 feet in diameter rapidly descended from  western sky at  90% angle, suddenly stopped, leveled, hovered 100 feet over store roof, turned, flew north just above trees

content.detailedDescription: I was driving in a car heading home. i saw the object in the air heading away from us diagonally. it then turned in the direction that we were headed. as we went down a winding road we saw it hovering over a small field. i was very excited when i saw it. we turned around and it flew overhead then we lost track of it.
content.summary: It flew quickly, then turned, then hovered. there was then a bright light and appeared to be another ufo but with red lights

content.detailedDescription: First let me say that i am a usaf viet nam veteran, with 4 years as a b-52 maintenance crew chief. i'm very aware of the flight characteristics of conventional aircraft. i also lived many years in the antelope valley in so. calif. with-in a few miles of lockeed/martin skunkworks and edwards afb where i have seen everything from the sr-71 to all the shuttles and many different types of aircraft flying day and night. what i witnessed this evening was un-like anything i've seen before. i was sitting on my back patio at approximately 8:30 pm talking on the phone when i looked up, out over the lake and tree line, and saw a large reddish/orange ball of light moving northeast to southwest passing directly in front of me.It immediately caught my attention due to it's abnormal size and brightness, but it wasn't close enough to see any real detail. something was going on beneath the objejt.It looked like bottom was on fire. the whole thing reminded me of a reddish/orange hot air baloon,at night, brightly lit ,slightly pulsating, with the bottom on fire, moving much faster than a baloon could fly. although it resembled fire under the object, it wasn't affected by the speed of the object like fire would be at a couple of hundred miles per hour.. everything stayed fairly constant throughout the sighting. the object was completly silent. it didn't make any unconventional or erratic moves. but i know that what i witnessed for almost a full minute was not anything i've ever seen in the sky before.
content.summary: Red/orange glowing large orb with fire like distortion below flying at steady speed,horizon to horizion, with no sound.

content.detailedDescription: Last saturday oct. 1st. coming back home after picking up my son from a friends house during the day, he and i saw what we assumed was an airplane because of it's vapor trails, this is quite common of course but what happened next is something i have never seen before..Hwy. 94 driving east between the cities of alexandria, mn. and osakis, mn. this assumed airplane had changed course in a sharp south-western direction, then changed opposite direction in a south-eastern direction then moved northward. the vapor trails created the shape of a back-ward "s". i'm thinking that the pilot of this craft lost his way, navigation problems. this is just something you don't see. this was the highlight of our conversation(my son and i) the rest of the way home. i told my husband when we got home, now earlier tonight my husband mentioned he heard on the radio about several reports in kansas and missouri areas past month now and i get on here and read almost identical reports of crafts making strange maneuvers, which prompted me to throw my 2 cents worth. still curious about what it really was.
content.summary: An unknown craft changing directions 3 times during the day(vapor trails, high altitude)

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting ouside the back of my house smoking a cigarette with my wife. she said "look a shooting star" and i turned around to see what she was talking about. initially it was white with a small streak behind it moving fast, as i turned around to look it turned green and blue with a very long orange contrail behind it. i observed the object for a total of approximately 5 seconds, from the time it lit up until it disappeared behind the trees in my back yard. the object rapidly picked up speed as the lights came on. the object was approximately headed south-south east from the area of crestview, florida. honestly, it scared the ever loving **** out of me. i have never seen anything like this in my life. about an hour later i was speaking with my sister, she had seen my post on facebook about seeing a ufo (of which it included no description). she asked if it was green and blue with an orange trail. i said yes. she and her boyfriend had seen the same thing, approximately 500 miles south of where i am, all the way in fort myers, florida. the event occured within the same minute that i saw it to when she saw it with her boyfriend. she reported the same object, moving at a fast rate of speed, headed in the same direction. i lost sight of the object as it passed behind the trees in my backyard, and then over the horizon. im a combat veteran of iraq, and this event scared my ********
content.summary: Green and blue object with long orange trail

content.detailedDescription: As i came out of a store i scanned the night sky.  in the west not too far away, i saw two bright white light (huge) heading towards where i was.  i  ran for my camera in my car and it was above me, low enough that i could see a distinctive triangular shape with three red lights blinking and a row of red lights in the center.  it moved slowly overhead as i filmed it the best i could.  i do not recall any noise.  i did state on my video that i have never seen a plane like that if it was a plane.  it was quite large and the shape is what made me feel that it was not a plane.  planes move much faster than this was moving esepecially if they are directly above.
content.summary: Triangular shaped object moving from wnw to ese at night, clear sky

content.detailedDescription: This is a few sightings from my security cameras. the ufos appear with a streak of light when they arrive in the evenings . lots of ufo activity here my friends .
content.summary: Sightings over a four day period > ridgecrest ca.

content.detailedDescription: Initially i thought is was an astroid burning up as it was entering earths atmosphere. i was burning for the better portion of a minute than dissapeared. it then reappeared and appeared burning again. there was no overcast, it was a clear evening. when it reappeared it turn abruptly. at this point another lady beside me asked me what it was. the light went out again and the lady proceeded back to her business. it reappeared again and turned again. it initially was heading south changed direction west and then north.
content.summary: Not a shooting star!

content.detailedDescription: There can be many stories i can tell you of a place i frequent on nights me and my buddy want to get a little freaked out. last monthly i had just left my ex-girlfriends house. she lives near where me and my buddy go ufo hunting.  well that night was calm as could be. not a cloud in the sky and you could see for miles. i was only a mile away if that from her house when i noticed two closely places yellow balls of light in the sky. i stopped and i turned my radio off. sorry if i miss spell stuff cause it makes me kinda tear up still. so i watched it as it slowly turned directions. it was going i think east and changed going ne. as i watched it for about a minute it had gotten closer to me. all of a sudden the inside of my car took on a blue glow. yet it didnt come from what i had been watching. with in 5 to 10 sec. i heard(this freaked me the hell out)foot steps running towards my car. not like one person but like the sound of 5 to 10 people running on this gravel road. i through my car in drive and took off. i didnt look back cause i didnt want to know what it was. i will say i hate to be on that road at night. i have seen roughly what i can honestly ufo's over 25 times. i would get them on film but i dont make the money right now to by a video recorded. but i would be willing to take someone out there. now i have seen things right down my road. i live right outside of cabot. yet oddly it mainly takes place at my buddies house. i have seen it but him and family dont want nothing to do with research. but back to my spot. now several years ago i was taking an ex and her mother home. oddly the live on the same road. they told me about seeing craft sitting in fields off that road. well one night as we top a little hill i saw the biggest craft i'd ever seen. to tell the truth it looked to be 2 to 3 hundred yards big. it was a line of 6 yellow lights in the sky thy looked to be 15 ft in diameter. it was stationary but as i got near it was no more that 100 to 150 ft off the ground. as i got close i started flashing my lights at. after a few times the lights lit up and it shifted to what i say would be a 20 degree angle and started coming towards us. as we neared the clearing it was a tree top level when it made a 90 degree turn to the right and shot off. i have other stories. feel free to contact me at anytime. i have had prolly 50 or more experience dealing with ghost and ufo.
content.summary: Its not the first time for me

content.detailedDescription:
I live just north of downtown st. augustine florida, approx. a quarter mile inland (west) of the inter-coastal waterway. roughly the same distance to the northeast, lies the southern tip of st. augustine airport's runway, so i'm well familiar with all the aircraft in the area, and i also carry an interest in aviation in general. i'm used to seeing the private jets taking off to the east-southeast, the tourist helicopters flying in overhead to land an refuel, the high flying passenger liners heading north/south (or vice versa) on their way to and from jacksonville, and i've even witnessed more than a handful of satellites circling the earth, just before daylight in the morning and after dusk at night. but then this morning, approximately 5:00 am, i finally saw something i can't explain away as normal. 

i initially spotted the object and wrote it off for a moment as a bright morning star. it sat stationary, due east, at about 20 degrees above the horizon. i know that just to the east-southeast lies the vilano bridge, so i'm not sure if it was over land or water, but i would estimate that the craft was again due east, at roughly a mile to a mile and a half's distance, possibly two.

the reason that i recognized the vessel was indeed much closer than a low hanging star, is because my eye was again drawn to it by a brief pulse or flash of light, (almost like a tomahawk cruise missile had been fired - only silently) as it began immediately ascending near vertically, leaving a trail nearly identical to that of a falling star, only on the incline, rather than the decline. it's ascent, again near vertically, was toward the west-northwest, and it flew just behind the fingertip of a cloud (as a rain front was preparing to move through) then i finally lost sight of it behind a tree, a big cloud, and the corner of the roof of my porch. while it's entire ascent was quick (taking 2-3 seconds) its rate if climb wasn't instantaneous, and the object seemed to accelerate throughout its journey.

so the blueish-purple tail was the most prominent feature, but just above this remained the whitish light that i had originally mistaken as a star, and atop this, (mind you the craft seemed a bit blurred together by the bright white light) looked to be what i could best describe as half a bubble. the outside edges of the bubble were white like the light, but the middle was the same dull midnight blue as the sky.
content.summary: Starlike object just off the coast then shot almost straight up like a missile.

content.detailedDescription: I was on break outside my work.  it was a beautiful day so i was looking upward.  i had noticed a white looking spot that was hanging around a cloud.  i asked the others if they knew what that was.  about 6 of us saw it.  it was ascending coming toward us.  then  all of a sudden... it just stopped.  i said look!  it stopped.  it stayed in 1 place for about 15 seconds.  it quickly started going the other way away from us.  we saw about two of them at the same time.  i told the rest of the crew i wish i had gone to get the camera i keep in my desk.  after break... that is just what i did.  i went outside thinking i might see something and take a pic of it.  i was about tired and i was just about to come in the warehouse, when towards the memphis airport i saw 2 black dots.  i automatically thought maybe they are having a show this weekend.  hardly... what i saw next... i can't explain.  they 2 dots were flying zig zagging in and out with each other... going around each other.  i told myself they arn't planes because they are too close and planes don't do that.  i don't blame you for what i am about to say... but these to things became as 1 and shot off.  i was able to take pics of them after becoming one.  after, downloading the photos, i had noticed that i caught 2 ufo's.  at least i have proof of what i saw.  the pictures are good but far away.  if you blow them up... you can see it aint no aircraft.  well... that's about it.  thanks.6
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.shape: Circle,   Cylinder,   Oval,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Triangle
content.summary: I saw multiple sightings what i believe to be dimensional.  i saw to solid shapes come together as one shape and take off rapidly.  others at my work saw what they believed also to be ufo's.  i was able to take two digital photos of these things in flight

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to assistant state director by phone yesterday: 

"i was driving on the highway and getting onto an on-ramp when my husband, daughter, and i noticed a very large triangular shaped object floating or hovering over the highway.  there was a triangle shape within the outer triangle, and the sides looked like they were about 15 feet high.  the radio went off by itself and we heard only static,  we could see a plane with a red flashig light in the distance above this object.  the object moved around very slowly and other cars around us were slowing down to get a look at it. we opened the sunroof and watched it. the lights were all on the underside and were bluish white, with approximatley 12 or more lights on it.  we did not see a red or green flashing light like you see on airplanes.  i called a local t.V. station and sent photos to them. we have never seen anything like this and know that this was not a plane or planes.  we see a lot of planes because there is an airport nearby, and can be sure this was not a plane."
content.summary: Huge triangular gray object with blue and white lights hovered over highway

content.detailedDescription:
October 7, 2011, at approximately 6:50 am my husband and i stepped out of our home onto our northward facing front porch and immediately observed a starteling bright light in the northern sky.  the object was stationary for a split second then shot upward in an eastward direction and disappeared leaving an arced trail that quickly faded away.

we live in the flight path for kansas city international airport and often see jets ascending after take off and decending for landing and, thus, see the lights on these aircraft.  the light seen this morning was much much lower and brighter than any of the lights we've seen on any of the aircraft related to the airport.  also, this light was stationary for a fraction of a second then shot upward and to the east leaving an arced trail of light.  the trail light appeared to fall upon fading away.

my husband and i are extremely excited because this is our first viewing of a ufo.  we were also not aware that other recent sitings in the kansas city area had been reported.
content.summary: Stationary bright orb shot upward & in ne direction leaving arced trail.

content.detailedDescription: Went out to see the tail of a comet that was supposed to be visible.  we were in college in canyon, tx so went out from town about 7 miles towards palo duro canyon.  there were three of us lying on the hood of the car waiting to see comet debris.  we noticed a pulsating star like light traveling slowly along the horizon to our left.  as we watched it pulse from one color to the next and back, it suddenly stopped and just kept pulsing.  then, it zipped across the entire sky above in about a second.  one of my friends had his pilot's license and he assured us that no vehicle we know of can travel that fast.  the light then would zip from left to right and down and across.  each time it would stop, it did this weird motion like a pendulum swinging back and forth and then it would make a 360 degree rotation from the pendulum movement, stop and then zip to the next location where it would repeat a similar dance.  we remembered having heard about cattle mutilations on the news the day before, so we got a bit afraid and after about 45 minutes or so, we decided to leave.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: A pulsating light along the horizon. stopped. then sped across the sky and zipped back and forth till we got scared and left

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to assistant state director by phone yesterday:

"i was driving south on douglass in lee's summit, missouri at 9:50 pm and came to a stop at forest street when a bright orange/red fireball moved over the top of my car from the back to the front and hovered over my vehicle, almost at exactly 90 degrees above me but slighly forward above the windshield. it stayed there for ten minutes.  i was too scared to move, or drive on and just sat there, frozen, until it took off very quickly directly east.  it was out of sight in less than five seconds.  it was approximately 40-60 feet in diameter and aproximatley 60 feet above my vehicle.  no other cars came by at that time.  i immediately went home, just a few blocks away, went inside the house and locked all of the doors and windows.  when i heard about all of the other ufo sightings in the area i thought i'd better report this.  i heard from some friends that they saw something similar earlier in the evening and they said they'd contact mufon, too. unfortunately, i don't have any pictures.  i was too afraid to get my cell phone out to take a picture, but wish i had now."
content.summary: 40-60 ft orange fireball hovered over my car

content.detailedDescription:
Cuba 1998
guanabo beach extimated time 9 to 10pm

my father and i were having a walk accross the beach, there was a strong wind and something odd about the clouds. it was a silent night and pitch black, once we stop to look at the horizon wondering if they were other living things out there one of the far away star beggings to be moving and getting closer towards us. at first we think is some kind of aircraft but then things get a little bit more odd, the winds get to have a cold breeze and the moving aircrat stars to flash and at great speed goes under the sea level, the sea level rises and wind gets stronger. the flashing craft stars to ascent from the sea level and goes behhind one of the odd clouds, at least we think it went behhing but is probably it went inside of it. right after the craft dissapears into the cloud a sudden tornado beggins to form under the same cloud, the sudden tornado cause a incredible heat wave and strong winds, as we ran inside the our second floor apparment that was 10 seconds away we turn back and notice the cloud had vanished, so did the tornado. the rest of the night was cold and silent as if nothing happen, but i remember the next morning seing several cuban army trucks filled with soldiers leaving the beach.
content.summary: Disc type with flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: On oct 3, at about 7:50 p.M. we were driving on 40 highway west heading towards noland road to return to our home near raytown.  as we headed west on 40 highway we saw off in the distance a rather large object with many lights.  it was moving very slowly and we wondered what it was but didn't think much about it at the time since we only saw it for a short time.  then, the next evening, we were going out for an evening walk since the weather was so beautiful on october 4th around 8:00 p.M and saw the same object again.  as we exited the house (we live up high on a bluff between raytown and lee's summit, mo) we noticed unusually bright lights in the sky and i said that i wondered what that was since it was moving extremely slow and looked very large.  then all of a sudden, it appeared to separate so then i thought it was three separate planes but just as fast as it separated it went back together as one and headed northeast.  i wonder now if it looked like it separate but in fact had just turned vertically.  we continued to wonder what it was but went on with our walk as it continued across the horizon.  when we got about 3 blocks from the house, we again observed the large brightly lit object in the sky and as we walked it moved very slowly and seemed to hover at times.  the lights would change sometimes being horizontal and other times being vertical, sometimes solid and other times blinking.  when we got to a cul-de-sac which sits on a bluff, we stood in someone's driveway and watched the object in amazement.  it was off on the horizon and appeared to be over the raytown area.  at one point it appeard to make a 180 degree turn and go the other way.  the lights appeared to triangular in shape when it would turn a certain way.  when it was the nearest to us we commented that it was making no sound.  my friend commented that maybe it was some kind of blimp since there was no sound.  as we were standing there, the person whose driveway we were standing in came home and we pointed the object out to them.  the guy jokingly said it was a ufo and we laughed and agreed.  as we started to walk we heard some noise and then saw a helicopter but the object had disappeared.  we ran into some other neighors who said they had seen it while they were walking in the parking lot of the teetering rocks golf course.  we all agreed it was like nothing we had ever seen but had no idea what we had seen.  after reading all these other sightings, i decided i would report what we saw.  it was never as close to us as others have reported but our description would be very similar to the others that have been reported.
content.summary: Large bright object flying slowly and very low near raytown mo

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i went to the azusa mts, while enjoying the clear night sky we noticed a light that wasn't moving in the same pattern as the rest of the stars or other heavenly objects. we stayed and watched for a few hours (3to4 hours) even as the rest of the objects moved towards one end of the sky, this object never left the position we originally spotted in. this star like object only moved side to side (north to south)with subtle but visible twirls. the star like object hovered above a hill, how high above the hill i don't know, but it was low enough that on the hill right under the object there was a bright green and blue flash coming from the spot on the hill that was right under the star like object. the green and blue light pulsated many times, it seemed like someone was welding but there was no welder. this was around 1 to 5 in the morning so it was pretty dark. we didn't have a camera up there with us, so we didn't record the object right then and there, but this strange light followed us home. the video clip attached to this is the object in the day light, not in the azusa mt. i shot this in east los angeles.
content.summary: Star like

content.detailedDescription: Every am i drive my 13 yr old son to his bus stop and we sit and wait for his bus and while waiting we are always talking about the stars we see every morning.  this particular morning my son glance up before me to view the same stars we look at every morning and before i had a chance to look up he said, "mom, what star is that?".  i looked up and started to tell him i did not think it was a star when he interrupted me and said, "mom, why is it moving, look, how could it move that fast!".  i was looking at the same thing he was and looked to the right of it and saw several, at least 10, more of the same light that would be in on spot and within a millisecond another, and kept repeating this at about 10 sec intervals. at this time, an airplane (looked commercial) was flying right past these, as if it did not even see them.  it was not military. knew it was a plane because of the red and white lights blinking and the steady pace it kept at a normal rate. anyway, it almost appeared as though the lights was moving in the shape of a triangle.  we got out of the car and everywhere we looked in the sky, we could see them.  if you were to glance up for a second and then look away, you would mistake the lights for stars.  but these were not stars.  my son's bus came, i started to drive down the road to my house and saw in the sky a much larger light that looked like the others but was bigger and much brighter and was actually moving along a path.  it was blinking at intervals but would be one place in the sky and then be in a completely different part in a second.  i ran in the house to get my sister yelling there were ufo's everywhere in the sky, come see, come see!.  and of course, she came outside and witnessed the last light i just wrote off, and then in a blink, it was gone, like it just disappeared.  i have seen on occasion, these kind of lights in the sky but only ever one here or there.  i have never witnessed so many at one time.  it was overwhelming.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple ufo's in early morning sky

content.detailedDescription: On oct 4 2011 i was at work and caught a real good look at a super gigantic ship that was slow to move and did a u turn in front of me. now this object was so low u would hear it if it was an earthly flying object, but no sound especially at its massive size. right after that all the animals came out and stood on top of a hill at work, weird. second sighting i happened to still be thinking about the first and was smoking a cigarette at 830am on oct 6 and saw an aircraft with a banner tailing it. i flashed my high intensity flashlight at it to catch attention, i saw the banner disappear quick as 10 seconds after i flashed about 20 aeconds later the aircraft in front disappeared....The sky was clear.
content.summary: Multiple sightings

content.detailedDescription: U was at work looking up for some odd reason, just happened to catch my eye. i knew it was a ufo, considering i have past military secret clearance. it was tree elevation above a hill at my job about the size of at least 5 747s end to end with no sound. it was extremely slow moving and did a u turn right in front of me. right after that all the animals of the woods headed to the top of the hill, it just left oddly enough. the second sighting was on 10-6-2011 when i was at home smoking outside still thinking about the first sighting, i flashed my high intensity flashlight at an object that looked like an aircraft with a banner to catch its attention, as soon as i flashed it the 'banner' disappeared and a few moments later the aircraft in front disappeared in a clear sky.
content.summary: Multiple kansas city ufo sightings

content.detailedDescription: I was in my house and looking to the west out my window.  just checking if it had come back and it had it is very bright in the night sky.  i thought it was the ufo that has been in our area for 6 days.  the obect looked disk shaped and it was moving side to side and up and down but not like a normal helocopter. it moved fast and and slow and was sending out balls of light that flashed around the object at a distance.  i knew the ufo was back, i thought it might after the weather cleared and it would not have to be under the cloud deck.  the object had disapeared when i last looked for it after 20.  i went to get some coffe and when i returned the object was gone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A disk object that was moving radomly in sky.

content.detailedDescription: As the other witness said i too have been seeing these lights for 2-3 years now. i saw them but not on the date he said, i saw them on the 5th, they seem to come in those months he mentioned and always around the same time. was way to windy for these to be flares that didn't move. i too reported this to the news over a year ago and was asked to do a story on ktxs news which i did. i'm assuming it was his video they used on my news story. i was in abilene at kirby lake when i saw these at 8:45pm looking east of abilene. not flares these lights always seem to show up around the same time of the year and around the same time. always does something different as far as the light patterns go. something weird going on out here for 2-3 years now. wish someone with professional equipment would come out and check it out. if you're in the area look east of abilene between 830-915ish.
content.summary: Orange lights again

content.detailedDescription: Me and my mother were coming home and was going around the round about at sampson when off to the right we seen what looked like to be a oval object flying real low to the ground. at first we just thought that it was just an airplane but it was flying way to low. but it wasnt moving very fast at all. i had made a joke about it beeing an ufo but i was just playing. until the next day wasnt anything in the sky, until nightfall also around eight ish me and my mother saw it again for the secind time, this time it was kind of moving in the direction of 470 hgh way towards 350 hgh way. i still thought the same thing that maybe its nothing. then today at work i heard som people say some things about it being on the news so i decided to share my story because i also saw the samething and its crazy if it turns out to bean ufo the whole time.
content.summary: Ufo hovering over houses. very low but to low to be airplane or helicopter. lots of flashing light such blue,green,yellow,red,white.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were leaving my girlfriend's apartment in the natomas area of sacramento tonight to return home. she was walking with us to my car. she looked up and said "what's that?" and pointed out three glowing red-orange objects in a roughly triangular formation to the south of us at about 60 degrees above the horizon. the three of us watched the objects for 2-3 minutes as they maneuvered around each other, occasionally crossing one another. they appeared to be moving, as a group, slowly closer to us and from east to west. there was no sound. when first observed, they appeared to me to be perhaps 10-15 miles away. my girlfriend estimated 20 miles away. as the objects progressed roughly westward, they began to move behind the treeline, blocking our view. i then ran to the other side of the building to get a better view. when i got there, i saw that the objects had dimmed and faded from a red-orange to a yellow-orange. shortly thereafter, another object ascended from on or near the ground in the southeast and stopped in about the same part of the sky as the original three. it then moved around in a seemingly random pattern. the original three objects had, by then, dimmed and ultimately disappeared. about a minute later, a fifth object ascended and behaved in much the same way as the fourth. the ascents were roughtly straight and, in my estimation, too slow to be flares or fireworks and too fast to be conventional aircraft. the fourth and fifth maneuvered around each other for a minute or two and then faded just like the first three. the event, from beginning to end was about 10 minutes in duration. my girlfriend, an air force master sergeant with 14 years in the service, said she'd never seen anything like this, even on deployment in combat areas in iraq and afghanistan.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed three red-orange, glowing objects maneuvering above southeast sacramento. then observed two more ascend from on or near ground.

content.detailedDescription:
Red pulsating ufo swaying left and right at high altitude, (like a gravitational propulsion) then disappeared.
five other witnesses watched it with me.
its red glow / energy allowed me to feel relaxed and reassured.

it looked identical to the ufo we spotted over the temple at burning man, although this one did not drop anything, it just faded into the distance.

earlier in the night (about 30 minutes earlier) we saw what looked like a stationary triangular shape with numerous lights, which disappeared as we turned the car to take a closer look.  since we were unable to watch it for very long, we were unable to confirm it to be truly extraordinary (other than its sudden disappearing act, and that it was hovering silently without moving).  i wouldn't have made much a fuss about it except for that we saw another (red glowing version) in the same hour. 

i felt reassured by these sightings because i had actually made a formal request for them to make an appearance and reassure me .. and that's exactly what happened!  i love our celestial neighbors!

i'd love to hear from others who also saw these lights, hence why i am posting this. 

{unconditional love}

flowerdust
content.summary: Red pulsating ufo swaying left and right at high altitude, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette when i notice the sound of a helicopter. i looked for where the nose was coming from and saw the lights the helicopter had. i noticed the object when a bean of light emitted from its lower extremities and flew maybe less than 500 ft. from where i was standing. i thought it was a helicopter until i noticed that there was only 1 helicopter sound (meaning there are 2 different sounds from 2 helicopters, only one was heard). the object, shape and everything could not see or hear, the beam of light showed for about 30 seconds before diminishing. then noticed it would take sharp or hard banked turns. i felt weird, like something is wanting us to know its here... i would never think that near a small airport like this, one would show up. the object and helicopter flew out of sight
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Chopper follows object

content.detailedDescription: I was driving s/e by marina del rey, ca. at approx 2 pm when i noticed a hugh blue round object floating s/w from behind a large cloud. at first i thought it was a weather balloon, but it was too large for a weather balloon. the object had no lights or windows or anything dangling under or around it. that object was so beautiful with it's blue hue and it's perfect circumference. i was 65 years old at that time and i never saw an object so large.  it was traveling at a fast pace and was driving in the opposite direction and lost sight of it.
content.summary: Perfectly huge blue round object..  the blue hue was darker then the blue sky.

content.detailedDescription: It was nearly midnight when my husband and i got ready to go to bed. we had just finished reading our bible passages for the night and turned out the lights.  the weather has been very nice, so i asked him if he would like to have our window open.  our bedroom is in the basement with an egress window.  he said that would be great. i got up to go over to the window.  as i began to crank the window open, i saw some lights outside.  our room faces a well-traveled street.  many nights it is very quiet with a few vehicles that pass.  he thought a car was passing by, as did i.  as the window began to crank open, i saw the lights were still outside.  they were not passing by as if from a vehicle but rather passing back and forth over our side lawn.  i stopped cranking the window to peek outside.  there were no planes, cars or other vehicles to be seen or heard by our house.  the lights were bluish-white and there were two, like spotlights crossing over our lawn.  then i looked up through the tall maple tree towards the sky.  the lights were being beamed down from above our house.  i was startled.  could it be a helicopter?  they have spotlights but these were bluish-white, ethereal and they crossed each other.  i was stunned, but managed to listen and hear a faint strange humming sound.  fortunately for us we had our mp3 player on the dresser, so i recorded the sounds for several minutes.  we had a very disturbing incident on september 25th at 9:30pm with humming that shook our home and paralyzed me with fear.  my husband has been shook up by that event ever since. i don't know what's going on with our area but there have been black and dark helicopters flying overhead.  these have been documented, filmed, and reported.  it's just weird!
content.summary: Beam of light
